FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Weapons 1: Ammunition Mines
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: From flint for arrows to the materials for bullets and gunpowder, these mines take up space that could be used for other resource mining. +15% weapons production. -15% mining production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Weapons 2: Smithy
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: A sturdy forge and sturdier anvil. Perfect for shaping metal into weapons and tools alike. +.5 base weapons production. -5% mining production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Weapons 4: Mech Salvage Shop
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: With the right tools, you can do more than shred dead mechanoids, you can salvage their tech to use against them. +.5 base weapons production. +5% military conbat efficiency.
